name: Quantum Puzzle
description:
The puzzle is composed of various states.

The states can either be "on", "off" or "random".

Random states can become either "on" or "off".

You can flip the state of one row or flip the states of two rows.

Start with the first level and play around with the game controls, sometimes it's really easy and the other times it looks unsolvable. Promise me it is solveable.

This game is completely free and generates random levels for an unlimited time of fun.

Hope you all enjoy it.
